be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti
Class LearningDecisionTree

java.lang.Object
  be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.DecisionTree
      be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.LearningDecisionTree

public class LearningDecisionTree
extends DecisionTree

A learning decision tree. This kind of tree associates to each node a learning set of elements matching this node.

All the nodes of the tree implement the LearningNode interface.

Constructor Summary

          Creates an empty learning decision tree.

LearningDecisionTree

public LearningDecisionTree(AttributeSet attributeSet,
                            SymbolicAttribute goalAttribute,
                            ItemSet learningSet)
Creates an empty learning decision tree.

Parameters:
attributeSet - A set of attribute. The set of attributes of the items given to this tree. Can be set to 'null'.
goalAttribute - The goalAttribute. Can be set to 'null'.
Method Detail

decisionTree

public DecisionTree decisionTree()
Returns a decision tree equivalent to this learning tree (i.e. without learning sets).

Returns:
A decision tree.
